result.markdown:
---
title: Install
---




::: {.panel-tabset}
## Python


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
# activate your conda env
conda activate repsim

# install from your repo (dev mode)
pip install -e path/to/repsim-python
```
:::


---

## R

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# from the repsim-R project root
devtools::install()  # or: R CMD INSTALL .
```
:::

:::
